name: 陳柏瑄
objective:
本課程藉由系統性的方式與工具帶領同學深入淺出地探索全球的企業經營模式。
同學課中能夠逐漸系統性的瞭解企業如何經營，並且配合量化工具與質性個案來客觀地分析與診斷企業的經營績效，以及如何反映在企業的股價與市場上的領導地位，帶領同學遨遊在全球企業多元的經營模式。

課堂當中包含企業內外在環境分析、經營者之任務與特性及企業內部診斷等範圍。課程適合有經濟、會計、財務分析基礎的商管背景同學，非相關科系背景的同學也能夠在課堂中有效地建立起企業經營分析與診斷的能力。

This course systematically guides students to explore global business management models through various methods and tools. Students will progressively understand how businesses operate, using quantitative tools and qualitative case studies to objectively analyze and diagnose business performance. This analysis will also show how performance is reflected in the company's stock price and market leadership, offering students a comprehensive view of diverse global business models.

The course content includes external and internal environmental analysis of businesses, the roles and characteristics of managers, and internal business diagnostics. It is designed for students with backgrounds in economics, accounting, and financial analysis. However, students from non-related fields will also effectively build their abilities in business management analysis and diagnostics through this course.
